title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText produces a beep sound when choosing SWT.MULTI. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the SWT example ControlExample under the Text tab, an undesired beep sound is emitted.
EB: I expect no beep sound to be produced when choosing SWT.MULTI in the SWT example ControlExample.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch Build F1 (20020521) on Win2K.
2. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
3. Navigate to the Text tab.
4. Select Styles SWT.SINGLE.
5. Switch back to Styles SWT.MULTI.
